sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Card from '@components/Card'; const card = [ { 'title': 'نمایشگاه', img: '/images/car1.png', id: 1 }, { 'title': 'جستجوی پیشرفته', img: '/images/car2.png', id: 2 }, { 'title': 'افزودن اگهی', img: '/images/car3.png', id: 3 }, { 'title': 'صفحه ی شما', img: '/images/car1.png', id: 4 }, ]; const car = [ { img: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/free-car-images/desktop/19021/mclaren-765lt-spider-2022-thumb.jpg', model: 2021, km: 53, city: 'زنجان', price: '45,000,000', show: 'سید', name: 'رونیز', }, { img: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/free-car-images/desktop/19017/ferrari-sf90-stradale-by-novitec-2021-thumb.jpg', model: 2010, km: 100, city: 'بابل', price: '5,000,000', show: 'احمدی', name: 'پژو', }, { img: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/free-car-images/desktop/18999/ferrari-f8-tributo-by-novitec-n-largo-2021-thumb.jpg', model: 2015, km: 5000, city: 'سهرورد', price: '85,000,000', show: 'محمدی', name: 'پراید', }, { img: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/free-car-images/desktop/19011/aston-martin-valhalla-2022-thumb.jpg', model: 2000, km: 300, city: 'تهران', price: '555,000,000', show: 'سید', name: 'بنز', }, { img: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/free-car-images/desktop/18962/rml-short-wheelbase-2022-thumb.jpg', model: 2020, km: 565, city: 'مازندران', price: '412,000,000', show: 'رضای', name: 'سمند', }, { img: 'https://www.mad4wheels.com/img/free-car-images/desktop/18961/porsche-911-992-gt3-with-touring-package-2021-thumb.jpg', model: 2019, km: 64185, city: 'رشت', price: '445,000,000', show: 'محمدی', name: 'تیبا', }, ]; export default function index() { return (
{card.map((item) => (
{item.title}
))}
); }
